title: Swap splash screen logo image to classic STOP sign static asset

requirements.summary: Change the single selected SplashScreen (per provided XPath) to use a newly generated classic STOP sign asset served from frontend/public/assets/generated/ while preserving existing alt text behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The `` at the provided XPath renders the classic red octagonal STOP sign symbol.
No other `` elements or logos elsewhere in the app are changed as part of this task.
The STOP sign image is served as a static asset from `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and loads successfully in production build.
The existing `alt` text behavior for the selected `` is preserved (no new user-facing copy is introduced).

file_operations.description: Add the generated image asset: Classic red octagonal STOP road sign symbol, centered on transparent background (stop-sign-classic.dim_512x512.png). Ensure it is placed exactly at `frontend/public/assets/generated/stop-sign-classic.dim_512x512.png` so it is served as a static frontend asset (no backend routing).

Update ONLY the selected `` element that corresponds to XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1]` by changing its `src` from `stop-venezolano-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png` to `stop-sign-classic.dim_512x512.png` (served from `frontend/public/assets/generated/`). Preserve the existing `alt` prop and do not modify any other images in this file or elsewhere.
